column1: #Text=Azula says : " It 's never too early for a sitting with the court painter , Zuko .
#Text=What do you remember about our great - grandfather 's history ?
#Text=" Azula says : " Oh , Zuko , it 's so strange how your mind works .
#Text=Fire Lord Sozin began the war , of course .
#Text=He spent his early years secretly preparing for it .
#Text=He was as patient as he was clever .
#Text=He famously waited for the comet , later renamed Sozin 's Comet , and used its power to launch his full - scale invasion of the world .
#Text=In the end , he died a very old and successful man .
#Text=" Zuko says : " But how did he die ?
#Text=" Azula says : " Did n't you pay any attention in school , Zuko ?
